sql.name: queryXhHouseLoanContractList
sql.sqlString: select a.CONTRACT_NUM,/*合同编号*/ a.CONTRACT_MONEY,/*合同金额*/ a.CONTRACT_DATE,/*合同日期*/ a.STATE,/*0：待签约 1：已签约上传 -1：取消*/ a.AUDIT_INFO_ID,/*信审ID*/ a.LOAN_APPLY_ID,/*申请表ID*/ a.REMARK,/*备注*/ a.MIDDLE_MAN_ID,/*出借人ID*/ a.ID from XH_HOUSE_LOAN_CONTRACT a where 1=1 $sql
